description: This course is devoted to team research/development projects, employing established software
development methodologies.  Projects frequently have an interdisciplinary nature, involving
consultation with faculty and/or students in other fields, and taking advantage of the particular
backgrounds of team members.  One or more research papers, posters, etc., on results are
ordinarily expected.  Prerequisites: One core course with implementation in computer science or
permission of instructor. Offered alternate years.
